body:
So as most of you know, I've been banned for Aimbot and Safe Aura. 

You might feel let down, betrayed, but I can assure all of you - friends, teammates and players - I DO NOT hack, I never have and I never will.

I'd like to say what an amazing 2 years it's been, through good and bad. I finally made it into the staff team and now I feel like I've been stabbed in the back. The staff are good, they do their job and strive for bigger things. 

Apollo have been amazing; they're a true family and I will never forget them, thanks for everything guys and good luck in scrims/tourneys until the staff see sense and I get unbanned.

All of those public players I've had a laugh with, it's been great. I always logged on whenever I felt like I needed a break from the outside world so thanks for almost being a stress relief for me.

Safe Aura: http://youtu.be/fd_zbNpB578
Aimbot: http://youtu.be/5-LfO2c0Ys0 (1:47 & 2:47)

I'll stay in teamspeak but obviously you won't see me in game, thanks for everything.

If you have any questions feel free to ask.



Peace.
body_tagged:

Apollo have been amazing; they're a true family and I will never forget them, thanks for everything guys and good luck in scrims/tourneys until the staff see sense and I get unbanned.

All of those public players I've had a laugh with, it's been great. I always logged on whenever I felt like I needed a break from the outside world so thanks for almost being a stress relief for me.

I'll stay in teamspeak but obviously you won't see me in game, thanks for everything.

Peace.

Just fucking 6 hrs ago we were playing a scrim wtf. I'm probably gonna get banned for saying my opinion but the staff is just banning whoever is good now. First there's Alex then you. You think you're cracking down on hackers but it's really just affecting the community. Like how many people do you have to ban unjustly. Spookez you will be greatly missed and I will always remember you as the sub :'c 

Maybe one day the staff will come to their senses and see the damage they are causing to the community. No offense but I thought the staff were supposed to bring justice. Instead we get a corrupt system (just speaking my opinion and ot pointing out anyone in particular ). You will be missed Spookez  <\3

Don't get me wrong, I greatly appreciate their efforts to keep everything fair but this is way too far.

I got banned on another Server for killaura.. lol at least that shows what a good pvp-Player you have been.
I only saw you around three or four times. But I am very sorry for you. Can't you just try and get unbanned?
